name: Asset Tracking report
query:
SELECT d.`item_code` as "Asset Code",
d.`item_name` as "Asset Name",
a.`custodian` as "Custodian",
a.`custodian_name` as "Custodian Name",
a.`location` as "Location of Asset",
d.`building_name` as "Building Name",
d.`floor_no` as "Floor No.",
d.`room_no` as "Room No."
     FROM `tabAsset` AS a
     INNER JOIN (
     SELECT b.`building_name`, b.`floor_no`, b.`room_no`, c.`item_code`, c.`item_name`
     FROM `tabBuilding Room` AS b
     INNER JOIN `tabRoom Assets` AS c ON b.`name` = c.`parent`)
     AS d ON a.`name` = d.`item_code`;
